story:
BREVE  RESEÑA

Mi nombre es Álex de Sande y soy profesor de un instituto de secundaria. Cuando fallecieron mis padres realicé el Camino de Santiago para encontrarme a mí mismo. Luego tuve la necesidad de regresar a mis orígenes, a mi pueblo natal: Graus (Huesca). A las afueras de la población me adentré por unos caminos que me condujeron hasta el Valle de La Fueva, un lugar de bosques mágicos, donde descubrí el Monasterio Budista de DSK de Panillo. Allí realicé diferentes cursos de meditación durante un verano y pude conocer a personas fascinantes que huyendo de su adversa realidad, despertaron la consciencia del ser e iniciaron un proceso de trasformación de sus vidas. 

Fui testigo de una cautivadora historia de amor que decidí novelar. En la obra se suceden personajes que irán desvelando sus pasados llenos de aventuras por medio mundo. Así se suceden las peripecias de un artista ciego que pinta sueños, un monje que parece levitar, las aventuras de una esposa atrapada en la lujuria, un cartomántico invidente que a través de su tarot ve el futuro y un tatuador de lotos azules invisibles, entre muchos otros. Los protagonistas son una mujer maltratada que quiere cambiar de vida y un profesor de yoga, que también es oftalmólogo, y que enseña a sus alumnos la forma de ver con los ojos del corazón.  

El relato destila mucha luz, poesía y espiritualidad. Sin embargo, en bastantes capítulos la ironía y el humor han conseguido arrancar carcajadas contagiosas a los amigos que ya la han leído. Eso me complace, porque sé que la risa lleva a la alegría, y ésta, a la felicidad.

PROYECTO

La novela consta de 555 páginas DIN A-4, por lo que tras el proceso de maquetación puede aumentar la extensión de la obra.  Mi objetivo es financiar la publicación del libro en versión digital y unos quinientos ejemplares en papel para entregarlos a los colaboradores (mecenas) y distribuirlos entre los medios de comunicación y librerías. 

Todos los amigos o mecenas aparecerán en la página web que la editorial piensa diseñar para promocionar la novela, pero en diferentes niveles, denominados chacras, en función de las aportaciones realizadas. Las personas que opten por obtener como recompensa un libro en formato papel, figurarán en la página de agradecimientos al final de la obra.

Me encantaría que la gente que no pueda colaborar, visitasen la página de Facebook: QUIERO TOMAR REFUGIO EN TU CORAZÓN, en la que figura el enlace con Indiegogo, y así podrían promocionar la novela entre sus contactos al colocarla en su biografía de Facebook. 

AGRADECIMIENTOS

Podría escribir otro libro de gratitud a tanta gente que con su ayuda indirecta y su influencia inconsciente han hecho realidad esta obra. Creo que los sueños se cumplen cuando tu ilusión desbordante contagia de entusiasmo a los demás.

Nunca olvidaré a mi padre por su apoyo discreto, por estar ahí siempre, por su enorme bondad. Ahora en esa otra dimensión espiritual en que percibo la presencia de su ausencia, le agradezco que hubiese insistido tanto en que acabará de una vez las muchas novelas que tenía empezadas. Recuerdo que me dijo con ironía si escribía en esta vida para publicar en la otra. Y quizá tenía razón.  Te quiero mucho y espero que me perdones por habértelo dicho poco.

Quiero agradecer a mi madre, desde lo más profundo de mi corazón, de que me diese la vida, la mía y la suya, por haberme trasmitido su pasión por la literatura, por haberse entregado en cuerpo y alma a sus hijos, por apoyarme tanto y haberle devuelto tan poco. Sé que me ayudas a no desfallecer desde el otro mundo. Te quiero tanto como te añoro. Necesitaré muchas vidas para compensarte. 

Me gustaría recordar a mi hermano Pedro, que vivió poco para morir deprisa, por haber velado mis sueños e iluminado mis duermevelas, enseñándome a escribir a oscuras y con los ojos cerrados, para ver hacia dentro y expresar hacia fuera los sentimientos que se refugian en el interior, emociones de luz y de sombra. 

Debo reconocer a mi hermano Félix el apoyo psicológico que me ha brindado en los momentos difíciles, y por estar ahí, como buen terapeuta Gestalt, para enseñarme a tener la confianza necesaria para superar las adversidades.

  Quiero manifestar mi entrañable gratitud por la amabilidad y el afecto de todas las personas del Centro Budista Dag Shang Kagyü en Panillo, cerca de Graus, provincia de Huesca. Lugar donde conocí al monje Karma Tenpa, una persona iluminada en la humildad, que me trasmitió en sus cursos de meditación budista la manera de entrenar la mente para despertar la compasión. Espero la benevolencia de todos los que hice protagonistas de algunos capítulos sin saberlo, y las disculpas de los que sin pretenderlo, me olvidé.

Por último, agradecer a Chelo Lázaro Prieto, maravillosa profesora de yoga y meditación, todo su cariño y amor. 

(P. D.1.Consciente de mi fragilidad, de mis dudas, de mis angustias, debo bendecir a Buda por haberme iluminado este camino y a Dios, por haberme dado fuerzas para recorrerlo)

(P. D.2. Me gustaría compartir la mitad de los beneficios de esta obra con la Fundación de Dag Shang Kagyü. Cáritas. Stop Ceguera. Creciendo en Nepal. Fundación Vicente Ferrer)

INICIO DE LA OBRA

Capítulo - 1 

De repente, ella se despertó con la angustia de ahogarse en un mar de sueños náufragos, y con la respiración acelerada se dio cuenta de que estaba hiperventilando. Empezó a aplicar las técnicas de relajación que había aprendido en las sesiones preparatorias al parto. Apenas había descansado unas horas por el disgusto de saber que la academia en la que trabajaba había cerrado sin previo aviso. Llevaba meses sin cobrar, pero tenía la esperanza de que algo le ingresaran. Esa ansiedad la empujaba a ir al cajero automático del banco hasta diez veces en un día. Al reclamar, siempre le daban nuevas excusas y le pedían más paciencia. Tenía la sensación de estar hundiéndose en la adversidad sin ninguna esperanza.

El divorcio fue una liberación. No iba a consentir nunca más las humillaciones ni los maltratos físicos ni psicológicos de ningún hombre. Con dignidad iba a criar a su hija sin tener que arrastrarse ante nadie. Por eso, debía sacar fuerzas de flaqueza para resistir y continuar luchando sin desfallecer.

Las paredes de la habitación y del resto del piso estaban pintadas de color gris a gusto de su exmarido. Ahora le parecían tan asfixiantes como los muros de una cárcel y quizá lo eran, porque se sentía prisionera de una realidad agobiante que no le dejaba salir. Por eso, había empezado a empapelarlas con folios en blanco, como si fueran ventanitas en las que escribía frases que le ayudaban a levantar el ánimo y a desahogarse, porque sabía que el rencor y el odio que se acumula dentro acaba carcomiendo el alma. Volvió a leer sus palabras con el coraje, el dolor y la rabia de las mujeres que nunca se rinden antes de la batalla:

“Hay personas que empiezan a morir en vida. Otras están muertas y aún no lo saben.  La putrefacción es sutil y rauda. Algunos, al sentir el olor a cadaverina se embalsaman, pero ya es tarde, pues empiezan a pudrirse por dentro, siendo el corazón lo primero que devoran los gusanos”.

Tumbada en la cama, pensó que desde pequeña había confiado en el poder de los sentimientos y la capacidad de las palabras para atraparlos. Ahora se refugiaba en la lectura para evadirse de la realidad al sumergirse en otras historias, la mayoría de superación personal para aprender como las protagonistas se enfrentaban a la fatalidad y sabían convertir la debilidad en virtud y fortaleza.

El timbre de la puerta sonó de manera insistente: “¡Ding, dong!, ¡Ding, dong!, ¡Ding, dong!...” Ella sabía, por su forma impaciente de llamar, que era él. Respiró profundamente, se puso la bata y con serenidad se levantó. No iba a correr a abrirle como antes, porque tampoco eran horas para que fuera a visitarla. La última vez que sucedió algo parecido, se puso tan nerviosa que al apresurarse se tropezó con el calefactor y se rompió un brazo. En ese momento, el sonido del timbre se complementó con una batería de golpes en la puerta que iban in crescendo: “¡Toc, toc, toc...! ¡Pum, pum, pum, pum...! ¡Pam, pam, pam, pam, pam...!” Y su voz grave empezó a sentirse desde el rellano a medida que arremetía con más furia: — ¡Abre, abre, que sé que estás ahí! ¡Abre, guarra, o tiro la puerta abajo! ¡Seguro que te he pillado con alguno en la cama! ¡Cómo le coja le parto las piernas o le capo en vivo!

Ella se estremeció y con las manos temblorosas empezó a quitar los cerrojos con miedo y torpeza. Cuando fue a abrir, él invistió la puerta con tanta bravura, igual que un toro entrando en la plaza, que se la llevó por delante de un empujón. Lucía, que era menuda, voló por el aire hasta caer de espaldas sobre la mesita que había enfrente del sofá, y un estrepitoso ruido de cristales rotos se oyó en el edificio entero. Los gatos huyeron y algunos vecinos atrapados en la cobardía bajaron las persianas, mientras cerraban las ventanas a cal y canto. Otros quitaron el volumen del televisor para escuchar la discusión que se presagiaba. No era la primera vez ni quizá iba a ser la última.

Capítulo - 51

  Regresaron al albergue en el coche de Blanca y se despidieron de ella con un cariñoso abrazo, agradeciéndole la amabilidad que había tenido en invitarles a cenar y en acompañarles hasta allí. Antes de marchar, se intercambiaron los números de teléfono, la dirección de correo electrónico y quedaron para verse más adelante. Ella manifestó qué deseaba que le diera consejo sobre que práctica de yoga y meditación profundizar para mejorar la concentración en los estudios. También quería que le informase sobre nuevos talleres y seminarios que se iban a celebrar los próximos fines de semana, pues quería asistir con sus amigas, pues la mayoría, cuando llegaba la época de exámenes, estaban al borde de un ataque de nervios.

Como era muy tarde, Max invitó a Lucía a su casa. Y le dijo: — Ahora si subes despertarás a todos. Es mejor que vengas a mi refugio secreto. Nunca nadie ha estado antes. Has visto que excusa tan buena tengo para llevarte al bosque donde los lobos se comen a las caperucitas azules como tú.

— ¡Qué malo que eres...! ¡Jajajaja...! ¡Sí, me has convencido! — encendieron las linternas y emprendieron el camino de Ejep. Apenas recorrieron medio kilómetro de pista de gravilla, que se internaron por un sendero de pinos y maleza. Hasta que él la detuvo y sobre un tronco ladeado la besó, y le dijo que esperasen hasta habituar los ojos a la oscuridad, pues era preferible continuar iluminados con la luz de la luna. Diez minutos más tarde, tras atravesar una espesa cortina de árboles, de repente apareció una casita de cuento de hadas. Ella no pudo resistir la fascinación que le produjo y exclamó: — ¡Es mágica...! ¡Está envuelta en una nube de luz azul fosforescente!

  Al acercarse, él le explicó que la barraca estaba apoyada sobre una pared de roca en forma de concha, que daba acceso a una gruta donde habitaban miles de coleópteros. Cogidos de la mano, la guio adentrándose en la cueva. Los ojos se fueron adaptando a la oscuridad a medida que la rodobsina estimulaba el nervio óptico. Ambos se detuvieron en el silencio. Entre ellos solo se intuían por la respiración. El nictálope de Max animó a Lucía a que levantase la vista. Entonces, ambos contemplaron fascinados un espectáculo maravilloso: la cúpula del techo de la caverna se había convertido en la inmensa bóveda del cielo, donde un enjambre de millones de estrellas no paraba de parpadear. Él, entre bisbiseos, le explicó: “Lo que estás viendo es una colonia de luciérnagas, la mayoría son larvas y hembras, que no utilizan la bioluminiscencia de reclamo sexual, sino como cebo. El espectro de luz que emiten, cada seis a ocho segundos, va de un débil a un intenso azul y les sirve para atraer en este caso a las presas. Hacen igual que las arañas: tejen redes invisibles y hebras pegajosas que despliegan desde el techo como si fuese un caladero, con las mismas técnicas de los viejos pescadores nocturnos; a continuación, encienden sus linternas biológicas y emiten destellos intermitentes que atrae a los incautos insectos, los cuales se acercan encandilados por el mágico brillo y el titilante reclamo, hasta que caen enredados en la trampa, igual que muchos mortales ante la belleza. Las víctimas atrapadas intentan escapar, se revuelven y la vibración de las terminaciones nerviosas de la tela avisa a las depredadoras de que alguna alelada polilla o mosquito ha vuelto a caer; es el momento en que izan con cuidado las mallas y los aparejos, algunos de palangre, recogen las capturas y se las comen. Por eso, alguien, en un rapto de inspiración poética las bautizó con el singular nombre de “Las estrellas de la muerte.”

Durante veinte minutos observaron extasiados aquel centelleo hipnótico. Estaban ante un espectáculo único. Lucía, con suma curiosidad, le preguntó en un susurro: — ¿Y cómo sus cuerpos consiguen generar ese resplandor?

La respuesta de Max no se hizo esperar y le musitó al oído: — La bioluminiscencia es un proceso químico de oxidación del sustrato de la proteína denominada luciferina, catalizada por la enzima luciferasa. A ellas se les ilumina el abdomen, y como su piel está recubierta con una especie de lentes conocidas con el nombre de cristales de urato, intensifican y multiplican el reflejo de la luz.

A ella se le ocurrió quitarse la camiseta y dejar al descubierto su espalda, y sobre la piel desnuda empezó a iluminarse el dibujo tatuado del loto azul invisible. Max le recorrió a besos el tallo de la flor hasta llegar a los pétalos detrás de la nuca, mientras sus dedos le masajeaban cada uno de sus siete chacras. La abrazó por detrás y le hizo el amor en silencio. El eco de un profundo gemido de placer recorrió los huecos de roca de la bóveda celeste e hizo temblar las estrellas de aquel inmenso cielo interior.

Salieron con lentitud de aquel viaje onírico. Max la llevó de la mano hasta su refugio. Entraron a oscuras. Ella se dio cuenta de que el tejado tenía dos amplías ventanas en el techo, de tal manera que la luz de la luna iluminaba el interior de la estancia. Subieron por una escalerilla a un altillo en donde estaba la cama. Agacharon la cabeza para no darse con las vigas de madera y se metieron entre las sábanas. En la penumbra, él pudo vislumbrar por el brillo de sus pupilas el centelleo estelar de la cueva. Se abrazaron y se llenaron la piel de besos y caricias hasta quedarse dormidos el uno en el otro.

A medianoche, ella vio como Max se ladeaba, cogía una libreta y completamente inspirado escribía algo. Estuvo un buen rato alumbrado por el resplandor lunar. Todavía hipnotizada, observó el movimiento de su mano atrapada en la caligrafía. Había sido un día inolvidable y una noche llena de magia y de fantasía.

  Antes de desvanecerse la oscuridad, Lucía se desveló y vio tumbado a los pies el cuaderno en el que él había anotado algo. En la portada, de tapa dura, destacaba el título: “Diario del Alma”. De la solapa colgaba la pluma que le regaló. No pudo vencer su vehemente curiosidad y con sigilo se movió para intentar coger el cuaderno sin que se diera cuenta. Debía deslizarse entre las sábanas con lentitud para no despertarle. Tampoco podía demorarse demasiado, porque no debía faltar mucho para que amaneciera. Con cuidado fue alargando el brazo hasta cogerlo con el temor de que no se le resbalase de golpe. Cautelosa lo abrió y vio que las páginas estaban en blanco. Enseguida, se dio cuenta de que habían sido escritas con su pluma de tinta invisible. Sacó de su bolso una linternita de luz ultravioleta, que solía utilizar para revisar las palabras ocultas que utilizaba para atrapar los deseos que ella antes anotaba, y leyó de la última hoja el párrafo final:

  “La visita con ella a la gruta fue perturbadora, pues nunca había estado dentro con alguien. Fue como ir por primera vez. Hacía años que no entraba. A nadie le había revelado aquel lugar secreto. Me ha evocado lejanos recuerdos de la infancia, cuando me escapaba de aventuras por las cuevas de la Virgen de La Peña en Graus. A medida que avanzábamos hacia la oscuridad, esta se hacía más densa, tangible y misteriosa. Nos detuvimos en la enorme bóveda y tuve la sensación de estar en el interior de un útero excavado en las entrañas de la tierra, donde una luminosidad extraña, biológica, emitida principalmente por los cuerpos de miles de luciérnagas hembras, apareadas en época de reproducción y que albergaban en sus entrañas docenas de huevos de nuevas crías, inundaban la atmósfera de una lucífera metamorfosis. Por las paredes del techo del cielo corría la savia azul de las estrellas, tan embrionaria y emergente que se colaba por las venas pétreas de la caverna hasta hacerla latir en una continua gestación, a la espera de que las miles de vidas que llevaban las rocas dentro despertasen de su sueño mineral, igual que nosotros.”

BREVE  RESEÑA
Mi nombre es Álex de Sande y soy profesor de un instituto de secundaria.
Cuando fallecieron mis padres realicé el Camino de Santiago para encontrarme a
mí mismo. Luego tuve la necesidad de regresar a mis orígenes, a mi pueblo
natal: Graus (Huesca). A las afueras de la población me adentré por unos caminos que me condujeron hasta el Valle de La
Fueva, un lugar de bosques mágicos, donde descubrí el Monasterio Budista de DSK
de Panillo. Allí realicé diferentes cursos de meditación durante un verano y pude conocer a personas fascinantes que huyendo de su adversa realidad, despertaron
la consciencia del ser e iniciaron un proceso de trasformación de sus
vidas. 
Fui testigo de una cautivadora historia de amor que
decidí novelar. En la obra se suceden personajes que irán desvelando sus
pasados llenos de aventuras por medio mundo. Así se suceden las peripecias de
un artista ciego que pinta sueños, un monje que parece levitar, las aventuras
de una esposa atrapada en la lujuria, un cartomántico invidente que a través
de su tarot ve el futuro y un tatuador de lotos azules invisibles, entre muchos
otros. Los protagonistas son una mujer maltratada que quiere cambiar de vida y
un profesor de yoga, que también es oftalmólogo, y que enseña a sus alumnos la
forma de ver con los ojos del corazón.  
El relato destila mucha luz, poesía y espiritualidad.
Sin embargo, en bastantes capítulos la ironía y el humor han conseguido
arrancar carcajadas contagiosas a los amigos que ya la han leído. Eso me
complace, porque sé que la risa lleva a la alegría, y ésta, a la felicidad.
PROYECTO
La novela consta de 555 páginas DIN A-4, por lo que tras el
proceso de maquetación puede aumentar la extensión de la obra.  Mi
objetivo es financiar la publicación del libro en versión digital y unos
quinientos ejemplares en papel para entregarlos a los colaboradores (mecenas) y
distribuirlos entre los medios de comunicación y librerías. 
Todos los amigos o mecenas aparecerán en la página web que la
editorial piensa diseñar para promocionar la novela, pero en diferentes
niveles, denominados chacras, en función de las aportaciones realizadas. Las
personas que opten por obtener como recompensa un libro en formato papel,
figurarán en la página de agradecimientos al final de la obra.
Me encantaría que la gente que no pueda colaborar, visitasen la
página de Facebook: QUIERO TOMAR REFUGIO EN TU CORAZÓN, en la que figura el
enlace con Indiegogo, y así podrían promocionar la novela entre sus contactos
al colocarla en su biografía de Facebook. 
AGRADECIMIENTOS
Podría
escribir otro libro de gratitud a tanta gente que con su ayuda indirecta y su
influencia inconsciente han hecho realidad esta obra. Creo que los sueños se
cumplen cuando tu ilusión desbordante contagia de entusiasmo a los demás. 
Nunca
olvidaré a mi padre por su apoyo discreto, por estar ahí siempre, por su enorme
bondad. Ahora en esa otra dimensión espiritual en que percibo la presencia de
su ausencia, le agradezco que hubiese insistido tanto en que acabará de una vez
las muchas novelas que tenía empezadas. Recuerdo que me dijo con ironía si
escribía en esta vida para publicar en la otra. Y quizá tenía razón.  Te quiero mucho y espero que me perdones por
habértelo dicho poco. 
Quiero
agradecer a mi madre, desde lo más profundo de mi corazón, de que me diese la
vida, la mía y la suya, por haberme trasmitido su pasión por la literatura, por
haberse entregado en cuerpo y alma a sus hijos, por apoyarme tanto y haberle
devuelto tan poco. Sé que me ayudas a no desfallecer desde el otro mundo. Te
quiero tanto como te añoro. Necesitaré muchas vidas para compensarte.  
Me
gustaría recordar a mi hermano Pedro, que vivió poco para morir deprisa, por
haber velado mis sueños e iluminado mis duermevelas, enseñándome a escribir a
oscuras y con los ojos cerrados, para ver hacia dentro y expresar hacia fuera
los sentimientos que se refugian en el interior, emociones de luz y de
sombra.  
Debo
reconocer a mi hermano Félix el apoyo psicológico que me ha brindado en los
momentos difíciles, y por estar ahí, como buen terapeuta Gestalt, para
enseñarme a tener la confianza necesaria para superar las adversidades.
  Quiero manifestar mi entrañable gratitud por la
amabilidad y el afecto de todas las personas del Centro Budista Dag Shang Kagyü
en Panillo, cerca de Graus, provincia de Huesca. Lugar donde conocí al monje
Karma Tenpa, una persona iluminada en la humildad, que me trasmitió en sus
cursos de meditación budista la manera de entrenar la mente para despertar la
compasión. Espero la benevolencia de todos los que hice protagonistas de
algunos capítulos sin saberlo, y las disculpas de los que sin pretenderlo, me
olvidé.
Por
último, agradecer a Chelo Lázaro Prieto, maravillosa
profesora de yoga y meditación, todo su cariño y amor. (P. D.1.Consciente de mi fragilidad, de mis dudas, de
mis angustias, debo bendecir a Buda por haberme iluminado este camino y a Dios,
por haberme dado fuerzas para recorrerlo)

(P. D.2. Me gustaría
compartir la mitad de los beneficios de esta obra con la Fundación de Dag Shang
Kagyü. Cáritas. Stop Ceguera. Creciendo en Nepal. Fundación Vicente Ferrer) 

INICIO DE LA OBRA
Capítulo - 1  
De
repente, ella se despertó con la angustia de ahogarse en un mar de sueños
náufragos, y con la respiración acelerada se dio cuenta de que estaba hiperventilando.
Empezó a aplicar las técnicas de relajación que había aprendido en las sesiones
preparatorias al parto. Apenas había descansado unas horas por el disgusto de
saber que la academia en la que trabajaba había cerrado sin previo aviso.
Llevaba meses sin cobrar, pero tenía la esperanza de que algo le ingresaran.
Esa ansiedad la empujaba a ir al cajero automático del banco hasta diez veces
en un día. Al reclamar, siempre le daban nuevas excusas y le pedían más paciencia.
Tenía la sensación de estar hundiéndose en la adversidad sin ninguna esperanza.
El
divorcio fue una liberación. No iba a consentir nunca más las humillaciones ni
los maltratos físicos ni psicológicos de ningún hombre. Con dignidad iba a
criar a su hija sin tener que arrastrarse ante nadie. Por eso, debía sacar
fuerzas de flaqueza para resistir y continuar luchando sin desfallecer. 
Las
paredes de la habitación y del resto del piso estaban pintadas de color gris a
gusto de su exmarido. Ahora le parecían tan asfixiantes como los muros de una
cárcel y quizá lo eran, porque se sentía prisionera de una realidad agobiante
que no le dejaba salir. Por eso, había empezado a empapelarlas con folios en
blanco, como si fueran ventanitas en las que escribía frases que le ayudaban a
levantar el ánimo y a desahogarse, porque sabía que el rencor y el odio que se
acumula dentro acaba carcomiendo el alma. Volvió a leer sus palabras con el
coraje, el dolor y la rabia de las mujeres que nunca se rinden antes de la
batalla:
“Hay personas que empiezan a
morir en vida. Otras están muertas y aún no lo saben.  La putrefacción es sutil y rauda. Algunos, al
sentir el olor a cadaverina se embalsaman, pero ya es tarde, pues empiezan a
pudrirse por dentro, siendo el corazón lo primero que devoran los gusanos”.

en la cama, pensó que desde pequeña había confiado en el poder de los
sentimientos y la capacidad de las palabras para atraparlos. Ahora se refugiaba

mayoría de superación personal para aprender como las protagonistas se
enfrentaban a la fatalidad y sabían convertir la debilidad en virtud y fortaleza.

altillo en donde estaba la cama. Agacharon la cabeza para no darse con las
vigas de madera y se metieron entre las sábanas. En la penumbra, él pudo
vislumbrar por el brillo de sus pupilas el centelleo estelar de la cueva. Se
abrazaron y se llenaron la piel de besos y caricias hasta quedarse dormidos el
uno en el otro.
A medianoche, ella vio como Max se ladeaba, cogía una
libreta y completamente inspirado escribía algo. Estuvo un buen rato alumbrado
por el resplandor lunar. Todavía hipnotizada, observó el movimiento de su mano
atrapada en la caligrafía. Había sido un día inolvidable y una noche llena de
magia y de fantasía. 
  Antes de desvanecerse la oscuridad, Lucía se desveló y
vio tumbado a los pies el cuaderno en el que él había anotado algo. En la portada,
de tapa dura, destacaba el título: “Diario del Alma”. De la solapa colgaba la
pluma que le regaló. No pudo vencer su vehemente curiosidad y con sigilo se
movió para intentar coger el cuaderno sin que se diera cuenta. Debía deslizarse
entre las sábanas con lentitud para no despertarle. Tampoco podía demorarse
demasiado, porque no debía faltar mucho para que amaneciera. Con cuidado fue
alargando el brazo hasta cogerlo con el temor de que no se le resbalase de golpe.
Cautelosa lo abrió y vio que las páginas estaban en blanco. Enseguida, se dio
cuenta de que habían sido escritas con su pluma de tinta invisible. Sacó de su
bolso una linternita de luz ultravioleta, que solía utilizar para revisar las
palabras ocultas que utilizaba para atrapar los deseos que ella antes anotaba,
y leyó de la última hoja el párrafo final:
  “La visita con ella
a la gruta fue perturbadora, pues nunca había estado dentro con alguien. Fue
como ir por primera vez. Hacía años que no entraba. A nadie le había revelado
aquel lugar secreto. Me ha evocado lejanos recuerdos de la infancia, cuando me
escapaba de aventuras por las cuevas de la Virgen de La Peña en Graus. A medida
que avanzábamos hacia la oscuridad, esta se hacía más densa, tangible y
misteriosa. Nos detuvimos en la enorme bóveda y tuve la sensación de estar en
el interior de un útero excavado en las entrañas de la tierra, donde una
luminosidad extraña, biológica, emitida principalmente por los cuerpos de miles
de luciérnagas hembras, apareadas en época de reproducción y que albergaban en
sus entrañas docenas de huevos de nuevas crías, inundaban la atmósfera de una
lucífera metamorfosis. Por las paredes del techo del cielo corría la savia
azul de las estrellas, tan embrionaria y emergente que se colaba por las venas
pétreas de la caverna hasta hacerla latir en una continua gestación, a la
espera de que las miles de vidas que llevaban las rocas dentro despertasen de
su sueño mineral, igual que nosotros.”

story:
A Bianconeri Blog szeretné eljuttatni Csabit Torinóba, hogy élőben láthasson egy Juve-meccset és példaképét, Gigi Buffont. Erre gyűjtünk! 

The Bianconeri Blog (HUN) wants to organise a trip for Csabi, so he can see a Juventus match and his role model, Buffon, live @ Juventus Arena.

More information: www.facebook.com/bianconerihu

http://bianconeri.taccs.hu/2016/03/27/vigyuk-el-csabit-juventusba/

ENGLISH AND ITALIAN VOICEOVER FROM THE VIDEO:

******** ENGLISH ******

Meet Csaba Oláh. He is the goalkeeper who protects the net of
Szabolcs-Szatmár-Bereg's Dombrad U19 team.
Everyone in Dombrad, a small town just a few kilometers away from the Slovakian and Ukrainian borders knows him as the most feared penalty stopper, who has kept clean sheets in several games so far this season.
These are just plain facts - what is even more interesting is that Csabi was born without a right hand. That didn't stop him though from deciding when he was just 7 years old that he's going to become a goalkeeper - just like his brother, father and grandfather have been. He is now Captain of the Dombrád U19 football team.
His role model is Gianluigi Buffon ever since he saw his amazing performance during the 2006 World Championship, where he actively participated in making the Squadra Azzurra the World Champion.
Csabi is working just as hard to help his team become successful. He doesn't care about the haters, or those who make fun of him - he rather proves them wrong every time he fearlessly stops a ball.
One of his biggest dreams is to meet his hero, Buffon.
Unfortunately, Dombrád and Turin are 1392 kms away - and so is Csabi from Buffon.
Let's help him get closer to his dream!
We, the Bianconeri Blog kindly ask you to support Csabi's trip to Turin - to Juventus - and to Buffon.
We will organize everything and of course, we will also document the whole journey.
Forza Csabi! Forza Juve!

***** ITALIAN *****

Ecco Csaba Oláh.

Il portiere, chi è il numero uno senza dubbio della squadra under 19 di Dombrád: quella cittadina é situata nella provincia di Szabolcs-Szatmár-Bereg nell’Ungheria nord-orientale, vicina all’Ucraina e alla Slovakia.

In Dombrád Csaba è conosciuto da tutti: lui è il „rigore-killer”, chi non prende gol per 5 partite consecutive.

Non la ritenete interessante?

Però Csaba – a causa di una malformazione congenita – manca il metacarpo destro.

Nonostante le difficoltà ha deciso di diventare portiere – come suo fratello, suo padre e suo nonno. E adesso lui è il capitano della squadra U19 di Dombrád.

Il suo esempio dal Mondiale 2006 è Gianluigi Buffon: il portiere italiano – dando una prestazione eccezionale – ha preso una parte importante nella conquista della coppa. Come Gigi, anche Csaba sta credendo nel lavoro duro, con cui – nonostante il metacarpo mancante –  può  auitare il Dombrád ad ottenere la promozione: essendo incurante degli increduli, rispondendo per le rime.

Csaba ha un sogno da realizzare: vedere il suo idolo da vicino.

Ma Dombrád è 1392 chilometri da Torino.

Quindi Csaba è 1392 chilometri da Buffon.

Aiutiamo Csaba ad essere più vicino a Torino, alla Juve ed a Buffon!

Il Bianconeri Blog vi chiede di contribuire alla realizzazione del sogno di Csaba. Organizziamo noi il viaggio e naturalmente diamo notizia degli avvenimenti.

Forza Csaba!Forza Juve!

story:
Hi,

I'm Anton and I'm a self thought novelist.

During the day I'm a chef, but once I clock out I spend my time plotting and writing. This is how it has been for the last 5 years, and I hope I'll be able to continue doing that. I am working on my craft, keeping to explore and grow not because I want to earn a lot of money with it or want to become famous.

My aim is simply to make people explore and discuss topics they normally wouldn't. I want to connect people with each other and with themselves via art. In my works I explore different issues in today's first world society. I try to raise awareness and recognission to topics such as bullying and mobbing in the working environment, punishment for showing vulnerability, the loss of true self and disconnection between people. Topics that are hard to face and even harder to honestly and openly talk about.

Up until now I was able to completely fund my own projects, education and motivate people to participate in the projects free of charge. However... during the recent months I've lost my job, and therefore facing a hard decision: either I stop creating and sharing my work or I'll swallow my pride and ask for help to be able to continue.

And I choose the later: I'm asking for your help to be able to further develop the projects I'm genuinely passionate about. To be able to write, pay bills, transportation, and a bit of honorar for my muses, who are working such long hours, pouring all their hearts and souls into the projects.

Thank you for taking your time to read this and even bigger thank you if you help me continuing the work. If you have any questions, please feel free to write me a message.

I've set a reward for anyone, who is willing to donate 200CHF or more. I'll print and post them over time, and I hope you'll like this personal token of thanks.

UPDATE 6-24-14:

The book is now available for sale!

You can get it a number of ways.

First you can get it direct from our store site at:
www.shop.samsonpublishingcompany.com

While there you can checkout some of Ari Lehman's merchandise, and Elite Stone Replicas made to order masks.

Or you can get it from our Create Space page:
https://www.createspace.com/4851170

It will also be available on Amazon.com in about a week.

Please go check it out and see what people are saying about the book!

~Gene


Well, the IndieGoGo campaign has come and gone, and while it didn't do very well at reaching our goal we still consider it a bit of a success. We have gained more than 100 Twitter followers @SamsonPubCoLLC , and we now have a Facebook page with nearly 500 likes at https://www.facebook.com/fridaythe13thtriviabook .

The book has begun selling through our store site. You can head over there and place your orders for the book now. You can also get the cover art, and mask art posters while you are there. Not to mention the made-to-order replica Jason Lives: Friday the 13th Part VI masks signed by Ari Lehman the First Jason which you can still get!

We are still waiting on word as to when the book will become available on Amazon.com, but you can order yours now through our store site. This will mean you can get it once it becomes available to us, and won't have to wait for it to appear on Amazon. We do expect it to become available on Amazon some time before the end of the month.

Please check out our store site as there are plans to add additional products very soon. Stop by our Facebook page and click like to get continual updates on the book and for chances at some great giveaways. Last week we gave away two free copies of the book, as well as three of the Jason pics signed by Ari Lehman the First Jason.

I would like to thank everyone that did contribute here on IndieGoGo! And I leave you with an excerpt from the book's foreword written by Ari Lehman...

"

6 - 13 A Friday the 13th Movie Trivia Book is the perfect accompaniment to a night of Friday the 13thfun with friends at home or at a local pub. I welcome everyone to return to Camp Crystal Lake where Mama Voorhees is waiting for you, and remember . . .

JASON NEVER DIES!!! Ari Lehman/FIRST JASON"


Thanks,
~Gene


Below is the original IndieGoGo post where you can check out all the artwork and more.
--------------------------------------

Be sure to check the Updates tab above.

Hi. My name is Gene.

The immediate goal and the reason for this IndieGoGo project is to get our first book published and out there for everyone to enjoy.

My wife Traci and I have been involved with the online trivia world since about 1996-97. We actually met while playing in AOL's daily live chat room trivia games. At the time, she lived in Tulsa, Oklahoma, and I lived outside of Scranton, Pennsylvania. Long story short about our relationship: We are going on 15 years together -- 10 years married -- and are living in Tulsa. Since we found AOL trivia, we have played thousands of games over the years. I quickly decided to become a trivia host, went through some short training, and became one of AOL's Community Leaders. Once AOL decided to do away with their Community Leader program and essentially destroy hundreds of online groups in the process, my friend Jim and I started our own trivia forum (www.zonetrivia.com), which is still going strong and approaching its 9th anniversary. We have live AOL chat room trivia games every night of the week. I personally host two of them at the moment. Over the years, we have made many great friends, and our love for all things trivia has grown.

I am writing a book titled "6-13: A Friday The 13th Movie Trivia Book." The main reason it will be first (there are more planned) is because Jason Voorhees was born on Friday, June 13th, 1946. (That is the first bit of trivia in the book!) It just so happens that June 13th this year is Jason's 68th birthday, and is a Friday -- a Friday with a full moon even. When I decided I wanted to do a Friday the 13th trivia book, I went looking for a good release date, saw that Jason's birthday was a Friday again, and decided it was fate and that HAD to be the day. 

You might ask, "Why a Friday The 13th trivia book?" It is a very good question. I have a very good answer though. You see, my family first got this cool new thing the last week of July in 1981: cable television. I know this because that following weekend a little thing called MTV premiered (August 1, 1981). I was only 9, about to turn 10 in 2-and-a-half months, but I was up at midnight and excited to be tuned in.

My memory is a very odd thing. I can tell you with absolute certainty that on the day we got it put in, the very first movie I ever saw on cable television was "Willy Wonka & The Chocolate Factory," which coincidentally is just a few months older than I am. I could also tell you that since my oldest brother was a huge fan of The Who, soon after Wonka went off we watched "Tommy." Yet, if you asked me about something from last week, I probably wouldn't remember it.

Now back to the moral of this story. That following weekend an almost 10 year old little boy had a plan that at the time would scar him for at least a month. I saw that "Friday The 13th" was on cable. The plan that was hatched was to turn on the channel it was going to be on and pretend to fall asleep on the couch. Back then I had a bad habit of falling asleep with the TV on, and if someone turned it off while I was asleep I would wake up instantly in a cranky mood. So, I was left to sleep on the couch with the TV on, and the living room light out.

The movie came on, I watched, was terrified, and after the initial terror wore off of my 9 year old self, I was hooked.

My best friend at the time, Craig, and I had sleepovers nearly every weekend back then. At some point when we were around 11, we began renting and watching movies every time -- the scarier the better.  We watched everything from the "Faces of Death" series of movies to many, many bad horror movies no one has ever heard of. A staple of those nights was the "Friday The 13th" movie franchise. I think we must have watched Part 4 about 20 times in 1985. That is probably why it is my favorite of the franchise.

When you combine that with my aforementioned love of trivia, you have the answer to the question, "Why a Friday The 13th trivia book?"

A Little About the Book:

The book will have hundreds of trivia questions and facts in it. It will include what I am calling the "Kill Index." which includes a list of every kill from every Friday the 13th movie, who killed them, the manner in which the character met their end, and any special notes that might be connected with the kill. For instance, the first kill by Jason wearing the hockey mask, the first kill that didn't involve someone named Voorhees as either the killer or the one being killed, or the first time Jason strangled someone with his bare hands, and much more.

The reason for this IndieGoGo is to get this book published and into the hands of interested readers. 

Our goal is set to $2,500 because originally we wanted to "pre-sell" the modest amount of 100 books to the generous people of IndieGoGo. At the time, that reward was set at $20 per book (about $5 of which was for shipping) -- that is $2,000. The rest was to cover any fees. We have since lowered the contribution that gets the book to $15, so that throws off the totals a bit. But we have a bunch of other great rewards available; check them out below.

As I said above, the main goal is to get our book in the hands of readers, but the funds raised here will help pay for the cover art we had made, some advertising campaigns we have in place, and hopefully enough to pay for some expanded distribution opportunities. Of course it will also cover the cost of the rewards chosen for your contribution level.

Our cover art was done by Diogo Lando of Portugal. Please be sure to watch the video to see The Making Of The Cover Art.


While trying to figure out the rewards, I started a conversation with Ari Lehman, the First Jason. He has been outstanding! We now have 10 signed photos from him (technically 11, if you count the one for me personally, which can be seen in the Gallery tab above). He will also be signing the 3 replica masks! And most importantly to me, he is writing the Foreword for the book! How cool is it to have the First Jason IN my book!?!

Announcing Our New Referral Program

We have 14 days left on our IndieGoGo campaign, and a long way to go to reach our goal. We are asking for your help in driving traffic to our campaign. You will be rewarded for helping if you reach certain goals. Please read the full details below.



If you refer people who contribute $100 combined you will receive a free copy of our book.

If you refer people who contribute $500 combined you will receive a 6-month subscription to horror magazine Fangoria. This include 5 issues of the magazine, a $44.47 value, or $65.94 at newsstands.

* If you refer people who contribute $750 combined you will receive your choice of a 1-year subscription to either Fangoria, or Scream The Horror Magazine. The 1-year of Fangoria is 10 issues and a $64.47 value, or $109.90 at newsstands. The 1-year subscription of Scream is 6 issues and a $77.41 value.

** If you refer people who contribute $1000 combined you will receive Friday The 13th: The Complete Collection Blu-Ray Box Set, approximate value: $110.

Here is the description from Amazon.com:
The 10-disc collection includes the twelve films on nine Blu-ray discs, as well as a killer DVD bonus disc full of special features on the making of the famous franchise. The must-own set will be presented in a collectible tin case with 11 hours of previously released special features and a 40-page soft cover book. The book is excerpted from Crystal Lake Memories: The Complete History of Friday The 13th, a fan-favorite volume that’s viewed as the ultimate memoir of the series, and highlights some of the 200 interviews, 600 photos, storyboards, concept art and more. Also included is a brand new, official Camp Crystal Lake embroidered Counselor Patch. 

The 10-disc set includes all 12 Friday the 13th movies, and the special Killer bonus disc.

PLEASE NOTE THAT YOU MUST FOLLOW THE RULES FOR REFERRALS LISTED HERE BY INDIEGOGO:

http://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/527406-How-to-Run-a-Referral-Contest

You can either log into IndieGoGo, or once you contribute any amount to our campaign you will be given a link to refer people. Please read the above link for complete details.

So, please get out there and spread the word, share our IndieGoGo and earn yourself some great rewards for helping me out.


Now let's talk about what you get for being generous enough to contribute.


Anyone who contributes $1 or more will get:

  • Their name added to our Thank You page on our website at www.fridaythe13thtrivia.com.

NEW! Anyone who chooses the $5 contribution level will get:

  • Their trivia question added to the book with name credit for it. This reward will only be open until 11:59PM CT on Monday, June 9th, 2014. This is so I will have time to make a final revision to the book and have it all set for release on Friday. If you submit a question that I have already written you will have the option of having your credit added for it, or submitting another question. Questions must be submitted by 11:59PM CT on Tuesday, June 10th, 2014.
  • Your name will also be added to the Thank You page in the book.

Anyone who chooses the $8 contribution level will get:

  • Their name added to the Thank You page on the web site,
  • A handwritten and signed Thank You postcard from me with the cover artwork on it. It will be postmarked on the release date of the book, Friday, June 13th, 2014. (Unless you choose this reward on the 13th and it is too late to get it postmarked.)

Anyone who chooses the $13 contribution level will get:

  • Their name added to the Thank You page on the web site,
  • Your choice of one of the 11" X 17" posters of the cover art with or without title or the mask poster with or without title.


Anyone who chooses the $15 contribution level will get:

  • Their name added to the Thank You page on the web site,
  • An unsigned copy of the book, "6-13: A Friday The 13th Movie Trivia Book".


Anyone who chooses the $30 contribution level will get:

  • Their name added to the Thank You page on the web site
  • A signed copy of the book, "6-13: A Friday The 13th Movie Trivia Book".

LIMITED EDITION 25:
Anyone who chooses the $30 contribution level will get:

  • The cover art poster with Jason on the dock at Camp Crystal Lake (with title and NOT the mask poster). It will be signed and numbered 1-25 by the artist Diogo Landô. Please note: since the signed posters will be printed in Europe, the dimensions will stick to European standards. The signed poster will be 30 cm X 42 cm, which is about 11.6 inches X 16.5 inches. Due to shipping time for Portugal to Tulsa, Oklahoma, the signed posters will be shipped to you by early July or sooner. (I am estimating that.) The unsigned posters will be printed in the USA.

LIMITED TO 10:
Anyone who chooses the $35 contribution level will get:

  • A 2-frame 8" X 10" of the climactic scene from the original movie signed by Ari Lehman the First Jason.
  • Note the watermark is only there to protect his signature. Under the watermark is says "Ari Lehman Jason 1"


Anyone who chooses the $40 contribution level will get:

  • A signed copy of the book, "6-13: A Friday The 13th Movie Trivia Book"
  • An 11" X 17" poster of the cover art (your choice of the 3, unsigned).

Anyone who chooses the $50 contribution level will get:

  • A signed copy of the book, "6-13: A Friday The 13th Movie Trivia Book",
  • Their name will also be added to a Thank You page IN the book.

Anyone who chooses the $60 contribution level will get:

  • A signed copy of the book, "6-13: A Friday The 13th Movie Trivia Book",
  • An 11" X 17" poster of the cover art (your choice of the 3, unsigned)
  • Their name will also be added to a Thank You page in the book.

Anyone who chooses the $70 contribution level will get:

  • A handwritten and signed Thank You postcard from me with the cover artwork on it. It will be postmarked on the release date of the book, Friday, June 13th, 2014. (Unless you choose this reward on the 13th and it is too late to get it postmarked.),
  • A signed copy of the book, "6-13: A Friday The 13th Movie Trivia Book",
  • An 11" X 17" poster of the cover art.
  • Their name will also be added to a Thank You page in the book.

Anyone who chooses the $100 donation level will get:
The Gift Pack to share the book with friends or family.

  • 5 copies of the book, "6-13: A Friday The 13th Movie Trivia Book",
  • 5 of the 11" X 17" posters of the cover art.
    Individually that would be $140; bundle now and save.

LIMITED EDITION OF 3:
Anyone who chooses the $500 donation level will get:

  • A made-to-order Elite Stone Replicas Jason Lives: Friday The 13th Part VI hockey mask, hand-signed by Ari Lehman the First Jason, with signing photo and certificate of authenticity signed by him. The mask retails for $120 by itself. This item is being made and signed specifically for this project.

(Note: This reward is for the signed mask. The bust is for display purposes only.


Finally, if someone is generous enough to contribute $1000 or more, 

  • I will write a trivia book on the topic of the contributor's choice. The size of this book will depend on the chosen topic. If the donor were to choose the movie "The Breakfast Club" as the topic, there is a very limited scope of trivia available. However, if they were to choose "John Hughes Movies" as the topic, that would be a much better book. (As I just typed that I think I may have found the topic for book project #4 after the Friday The 13th, Game Of Thrones, and M*A*S*H books are done.)

If you have any questions or comments, use the comments tab above or email me at Gene@fridaythe13thtrivia.com.

Thank you for your time, and hopefully for your contribution. If you can't contribute, you can still help out by spreading the word to anyone you can! Share it on Facebook or Twitter, email it to a friend you know might be interested -- every little bit helps! Use IndieGoGo's built-in sharing tools to make it nice and simple to help spread the word.

Ari Lehman the First Jason: www.firstjason.com

UPDATE 6-24-14:The book is now available for sale!You can get it a number of ways.First you can get it direct from our store site at:www.shop.samsonpublishingcompany.comWhile there you can checkout some of Ari Lehman's merchandise, and Elite Stone Replicas made to order masks.Or you can get it from our Create Space page:https://www.createspace.com/4851170It will also be available on Amazon.com in about a week.Please go check it out and see what people are saying about the book!~GeneWell, the IndieGoGo campaign has come and gone, and while it didn't do very well at reaching our goal we still consider it a bit of a success. We have gained more than 100 Twitter followers @SamsonPubCoLLC , and we now have a Facebook page with nearly 500 likes at https://www.facebook.com/fridaythe13thtriviabook .The book has begun selling through our store site. You can head over there and place your orders for the book now. You can also get the cover art, and mask art posters while you are there. Not to mention the made-to-order replica Jason Lives: Friday the 13th Part VI masks signed by Ari Lehman the First Jason which you can still get!We are still waiting on word as to when the book will become available on Amazon.com, but you can order yours now through our store site. This will mean you can get it once it becomes available to us, and won't have to wait for it to appear on Amazon. We do expect it to become available on Amazon some time before the end of the month.Please check out our store site as there are plans to add additional products very soon. Stop by our Facebook page and click like to get continual updates on the book and for chances at some great giveaways. Last week we gave away two free copies of the book, as well as three of the Jason pics signed by Ari Lehman the First Jason.I would like to thank everyone that did contribute here on IndieGoGo! And I leave you with an excerpt from the book's foreword written by Ari Lehman..."6 - 13 A Friday the 13th Movie Trivia
Book is the perfect accompaniment to a night of Friday the 13thfun with friends at home or
at a local pub. I welcome everyone to return to Camp Crystal Lake where Mama
Voorhees is waiting for you, and remember . . . 
JASON NEVER DIES!!! Ari Lehman/FIRST JASON"Thanks,~GeneBelow is the original IndieGoGo post where you can check out all the artwork and more.--------------------------------------Be sure to check the Updates tab above.Hi. My name is Gene.The immediate goal and the reason for this IndieGoGo project is to get our first book published and out there for everyone to enjoy.My wife Traci and I have been involved with the online trivia world since about 1996-97. We actually met while playing in AOL's daily live chat room trivia games. At the time, she lived in Tulsa, Oklahoma, and I lived outside of Scranton, Pennsylvania. Long story short about our relationship: We are going on 15 years together -- 10 years married -- and are living in Tulsa. Since we found AOL trivia, we have played thousands of games over the years. I quickly decided to become a trivia host, went through some short training, and became one of AOL's Community Leaders. Once AOL decided to do away with their Community Leader program and essentially destroy hundreds of online groups in the process, my friend Jim and I started our own trivia forum (www.zonetrivia.com), which is still going strong and approaching its 9th anniversary. We have live AOL chat room trivia games every night of the week. I personally host two of them at the moment. Over the years, we have made many great friends, and our love for all things trivia has grown.I am writing a book titled "6-13: A Friday The 13th Movie Trivia Book." The main reason it will be first (there are more planned) is because Jason Voorhees was born on Friday, June 13th, 1946. (That is the first bit of trivia in the book!) It just so happens that June 13th this year is Jason's 68th birthday, and is a Friday -- a Friday with a full moon even. When I decided I wanted to do a Friday the 13th trivia book, I went looking for a good release date, saw that Jason's birthday was a Friday again, and decided it was fate and that HAD to be the day. You might ask, "Why a Friday The 13th trivia book?" It is a very good question. I have a very good answer though. You see, my family first got this cool new thing the last week of July in 1981: cable television. I know this because that following weekend a little thing called MTV premiered (August 1, 1981). I was only 9, about to turn 10 in 2-and-a-half months, but I was up at midnight and excited to be tuned in.My memory is a very odd thing. I can tell you with absolute certainty that on the day we got it put in, the very first movie I ever saw on cable television was "Willy Wonka & The Chocolate Factory," which coincidentally is just a few months older than I am. I could also tell you that since my oldest brother was a huge fan of The Who, soon after Wonka went off we watched "Tommy." Yet, if you asked me about something from last week, I probably wouldn't remember it.Now back to the moral of this story. That following weekend an almost 10 year old little boy had a plan that at the time would scar him for at least a month. I saw that "Friday The 13th" was on cable. The plan that was hatched was to turn on the channel it was going to be on and pretend to fall asleep on the couch. Back then I had a bad habit of falling asleep with the TV on, and if someone turned it off while I was asleep I would wake up instantly in a cranky mood. So, I was left to sleep on the couch with the TV on, and the living room light out.The movie came on, I watched, was terrified, and after the initial terror wore off of my 9 year old self, I was hooked.My best friend at the time, Craig, and I had sleepovers nearly every weekend back then. At some point when we were around 11, we began renting and watching movies every time -- the scarier the better.  We watched everything from the "Faces of Death" series of movies to many, many bad horror movies no one has ever heard of. A staple of those nights was the "Friday The 13th" movie franchise. I think we must have watched Part 4 about 20 times in 1985. That is probably why it is my favorite of the franchise.When you combine that with my aforementioned love of trivia, you have the answer to the question, "Why a Friday The 13th trivia book?"A Little About the Book:The book will have hundreds of trivia questions and facts in it. It will include what I am calling the "Kill Index." which includes a list of every kill from every Friday the 13th movie, who killed them, the manner in which the character met their end, and any special notes that might be connected with the kill. For instance, the first kill by Jason wearing the hockey mask, the first kill that didn't involve someone named Voorhees as either the killer or the one being killed, or the first time Jason strangled someone with his bare hands, and much more.The reason for this IndieGoGo is to get this book published and into the hands of interested readers. Our goal is set to $2,500 because originally we wanted to "pre-sell" the modest amount of 100 books to the generous people of IndieGoGo. At the time, that reward was set at $20 per book (about $5 of which was for shipping) -- that is $2,000. The rest was to cover any fees. We have since lowered the contribution that gets the book to $15, so that throws off the totals a bit. But we have a bunch of other great rewards available; check them out below.As I said above, the main goal is to get our book in the hands of readers, but the funds raised here will help pay for the cover art we had made, some advertising campaigns we have in place, and hopefully enough to pay for some expanded distribution opportunities. Of course it will also cover the cost of the rewards chosen for your contribution level.Our cover art was done by Diogo Lando of Portugal. Please be sure to watch the video to see The Making Of The Cover Art.While trying to figure out the rewards, I started a conversation with Ari Lehman, the First Jason. He has been outstanding! We now have 10 signed photos from him (technically 11, if you count the one for me personally, which can be seen in the Gallery tab above). He will also be signing the 3 replica masks! And most importantly to me, he is writing the Foreword for the book! How cool is it to have the First Jason IN my book!?!Announcing Our New Referral ProgramWe have 14 days left on our IndieGoGo campaign, and a long way to go to reach our goal. We are asking for your help in driving traffic to our campaign. You will be rewarded for helping if you reach certain goals. Please read the full details below.If you refer people who contribute $100 combined you will receive a free copy of our book.If you refer people who contribute $500 combined you will receive a 6-month subscription to horror magazine Fangoria. This include 5 issues of the magazine, a $44.47 value, or $65.94 at newsstands.* If you refer people who contribute $750 combined you will receive your choice of a 1-year subscription to either Fangoria, or Scream The Horror Magazine. The 1-year of Fangoria is 10 issues and a $64.47 value, or $109.90 at newsstands. The 1-year subscription of Scream is 6 issues and a $77.41 value.** If you refer people who contribute $1000 combined you will receive Friday The 13th: The Complete Collection Blu-Ray Box Set, approximate value: $110.Here is the description from Amazon.com:The 10-disc collection includes the twelve films on nine Blu-ray discs, as well as a killer DVD bonus disc full of special features on the making of the famous franchise. The must-own set will be presented in a collectible tin case with 11 hours of previously released special features and a 40-page soft cover book. The book is excerpted from Crystal Lake Memories: The Complete History of Friday The 13th, a fan-favorite volume that’s viewed as the ultimate memoir of the series, and highlights some of the 200 interviews, 600 photos, storyboards, concept art and more. Also included is a brand new, official Camp Crystal Lake embroidered Counselor Patch. The 10-disc set includes all 12 Friday the 13th movies, and the special Killer bonus disc.PLEASE NOTE THAT YOU MUST FOLLOW THE RULES FOR REFERRALS LISTED HERE BY INDIEGOGO:http://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/527406-How-to-Run-a-Referral-ContestYou can either log into IndieGoGo, or once you contribute any amount to our campaign you will be given a link to refer people. Please read the above link for complete details.So, please get out there and spread the word, share our IndieGoGo and earn yourself some great rewards for helping me out.Now let's talk about what you get for being generous enough to contribute.Anyone who contributes $1 or more will get:
Their name added to our Thank You page on our website at www.fridaythe13thtrivia.com.
NEW! Anyone who chooses the $5 contribution level will get:
Their trivia question added to the book with name credit for it. This reward will only be open until 11:59PM CT on Monday, June 9th, 2014. This is so I will have time to make a final revision to the book and have it all set for release on Friday. If you submit a question that I have already written you will have the option of having your credit added for it, or submitting another question. Questions must be submitted by 11:59PM CT on Tuesday, June 10th, 2014.
Your name will also be added to the Thank You page in the book.
Anyone who chooses the $8 contribution level will get:

Their name added to the Thank You page on the web site,


A handwritten and signed Thank You postcard from me with the cover artwork on it. It will be postmarked on the release date of the book, Friday, June 13th, 2014. (Unless you choose this reward on the 13th and it is too late to get it postmarked.)

Anyone who chooses the $13 contribution level will get:

Their name added to the Thank You page on the web site,

Your choice of one of the 11" X 17" posters of the cover art with or without title or the mask poster with or without title.
Anyone who chooses the $15 contribution level will get:

Their name added to the Thank You page on the web site,


An unsigned copy of the book, "6-13: A Friday The 13th Movie Trivia Book".




Anyone who chooses the $30 contribution level will get:

Their name added to the Thank You page on the web site


A signed copy of the book, "6-13: A Friday The 13th Movie Trivia Book".

LIMITED EDITION 25:Anyone who chooses the $30 contribution level will get:
The cover art poster with Jason on the dock at Camp Crystal Lake (with title and NOT the mask poster). It will be signed and numbered 1-25 by the artist Diogo Landô. Please note: since the signed posters will be printed in Europe, the dimensions will stick to European standards. The signed poster will be 30 cm X 42 cm, which is about 11.6 inches X 16.5 inches. Due to shipping time for Portugal to Tulsa, Oklahoma, the signed posters will be shipped to you by early July or sooner. (I am estimating that.) The unsigned posters will be printed in the USA.
LIMITED TO 10:Anyone who chooses the $35 contribution level will get:

A 2-frame 8" X 10" of the climactic scene from the original movie signed by Ari Lehman the First Jason.


Note the watermark is only there to protect his signature. Under the watermark is says "Ari Lehman Jason 1"

Anyone who chooses the $40 contribution level will get:

A signed copy of the book, "6-13: A Friday The 13th Movie Trivia Book"


An 11" X 17" poster of the cover art (your choice of the 3, unsigned).

Anyone who chooses the $50 contribution level will get:

A signed copy of the book, "6-13: A Friday The 13th Movie Trivia Book",


Their name will also be added to a Thank You page IN the book.

Anyone who chooses the $60 contribution level will get:

A signed copy of the book, "6-13: A Friday The 13th Movie Trivia Book",


An 11" X 17" poster of the cover art (your choice of the 3, unsigned)


Their name will also be added to a Thank You page in the book.

Anyone who chooses the $70 contribution level will get:

A handwritten and signed Thank You postcard from me with the cover artwork on it. It will be postmarked on the release date of the book, Friday, June 13th, 2014. (Unless you choose this reward on the 13th and it is too late to get it postmarked.),


A signed copy of the book, "6-13: A Friday The 13th Movie Trivia Book",


An 11" X 17" poster of the cover art.


Their name will also be added to a Thank You page in the book.

Anyone who chooses the $100 donation level will get:The Gift Pack to share the book with friends or family.

5 copies of the book, "6-13: A Friday The 13th Movie Trivia Book",


5 of the 11" X 17" posters of the cover art.Individually that would be $140; bundle now and save.

LIMITED EDITION OF 3:Anyone who chooses the $500 donation level will get:
A made-to-order Elite Stone Replicas Jason Lives: Friday The 13th Part VI hockey mask, hand-signed by Ari Lehman the First Jason, with signing photo and certificate of authenticity signed by him. The mask retails for $120 by itself. This item is being made and signed specifically for this project.
(Note: This reward is for the signed mask. The bust is for display purposes only.Finally, if someone is generous enough to contribute $1000 or more, 
I will write a trivia book on the topic of the contributor's choice. The size of this book will depend on the chosen topic. If the donor were to choose the movie "The Breakfast Club" as the topic, there is a very limited scope of trivia available. However, if they were to choose "John Hughes Movies" as the topic, that would be a much better book. (As I just typed that I think I may have found the topic for book project #4 after the Friday The 13th, Game Of Thrones, and M*A*S*H books are done.)
If you have any questions or comments, use the comments tab above or email me at Gene@fridaythe13thtrivia.com.Thank you for your time, and hopefully for your contribution. If you can't contribute, you can still help out by spreading the word to anyone you can! Share it on Facebook or Twitter, email it to a friend you know might be interested -- every little bit helps! Help us to Give Mike Crockart MP his P45

Mike Crockart is the last Liberal Democrat MP in Edinburgh. Can you help us elect an SNP MP in his place?
Edinburgh Western Scottish National Party are seeking to elect an SNP candidate for Westminster in Edinburgh West. 
However, following on from a long referendum campaign we need financial help to ensure we elect a parliamentarian who will ensure Westminster keeps the vow of "substantial new powers" they promised before the referendum.
  • We need to elect an SNP MP to ensure we keep further Scottish Devolution on the table and hold "Westminster's feet to the fire".
  • An SNP candidate will ensure a Stronger Voice for Scotland at Westminster.

Whatever you can donate towards our campaign will be used to ensure a strong SNP voice is elected in Edinburgh West.

With your help we can ensure that Scotland will not be forgotten by Westminster.

All funds will be used directly in the campaign to win big in Edinburgh West

Promoted by Edinburgh Western SNP C/O Gordon Lamb House, 3 Jackson's Entry, EH8 8PJ

story:
Prose in the Park (PiP) is a grassroots literary festival and book fair organized and curated by English and French writers and publishers from the National Capital Region.

In 2015, our inaugural festival welcomed 1200 visitors and 150 Canadian writers, publishers, and booksellers to Parkdale Park for a day of readings, networking, and celebration, making it Ottawa’s favourite open-air literary festival and book fair.

So we are doing it again!

Prose in the Park 2016 will take place in Ottawa on June 4 and will bring over 50 Canadian authors, including Heather O’Neill, Saleema Nawaz, Caroline Pignant and Ian Hamilton, and 2000+ writers, readers, book lovers, and families once more to Parkdale Park and Ottawa’s vibrant west end.

What is Prose in the Park?

Prose in the Park is an initiative of the Ottawa Independent Writers (OIW), a Canadian federally registered not-for-profit association (federal registration # 205463-9) that has served the Ottawa writing community for 30 years, A 100% volunteer-run steering committee representing the Hintonburg Community Association, the Hintonburg Economic Development Committee, L’Association des Auteures et Auteurs de l’Ontario Francais (OAAF), the Capital Crime Writers, The Ottawa Science Fiction and Fantasy Society, the Ottawa Romance Writers Association, the Ottawa Storytellers and the Canadian Authors Association – National Capital Region organizes the event, working together to ensure that the festival represents the excellence and diversity of Canadian  literary production.

Why Prose in the Park?

Prose in the Park is unique among literary festivals in that it provides local emerging authors, award-winning Canadian authors, Anglophone and Francophone authors, self-published authors, publishers, and local booksellers, and readers of all genres and interests with the rare opportunity to meet and engage with each other in a friendly, interactive, and festive environment.

As a grassroots festival organized by and for the local writing community, Prose in the Park was created in order to provide Ottawa with an exciting, free, local literary festival that is inclusive, welcoming, and truly representative of Canada’s rich, diverse literary community. We believe this festival contributes to the quality of life in Ottawa by providing opportunities for community members of all ages to gather, participate in their local literary scene, listen to great stories, meet great storytellers and support the local literary economy.

In 2015 over 90% of the inaugural festival’s expenses were met thanks to in-kind contributions. The remaining expenses were covered by financial contributions from local businesses, private donations, the OIW, and vendor fees.

For the 2016 festival, we are requesting financial contributions and in-kind donations from local businesses and community members like you. All donations will be used to pay author travel and speaking fees, cover the costs of promotional materials (including our website, printed programmes, and posters) and refreshments for authors and volunteers during the Festival.

And every little bit helps! Even if we don’t meet our Indiegogo target, all donated funds will go to support the Festival, with the priority being to cover the travel costs and speaking fees of our exceptional featured authors!

No money; no problem. There are lots of ways to get involved!

Sure we need money, but we also need you! There are so many ways to get involved with Pose in the Park.

*Publishers, book-sellers, and self-published author -- join us as a Book Fair vendor on June 4.

*Volunteers – join the steering committee to have your say in planning the event. We also need your help to make the event run smoothly June 4.

*Readers, writers, book lovers, families and supporters – Join us for the second annual Prose in the Park Literary Festival and Book Fair on June 4, 2016. And be sure to share this campaign, follow us on twitter, and join our Facebook group.

story:
Cronache Ribelli non è soltanto l’appellativo di questo Almanacco, ma anche il nome di un progetto di narrazione storica di cui questa pubblicazione è il primo passo tangibile.

Il nostro obiettivo è creare una realtà che promuova un racconto storico alternativo a quelli classici. Alternativo nei protagonisti: classi popolari, gruppi emarginati e subalterni, diventano gli attori che calcano i nostri palcoscenici scalzando i “grandi” della storia. Alternativo nella narrazione: una prosa dinamica e fluida, coincisa ed emozionale, per fare breccia negli ambienti popolari e per favorire la fruibilità dei contenuti. Alternativo nella costruzione: un progetto orizzontale in cui tutti i partecipanti hanno diritti pari al contributo che possono apportare. Alternativo nella forma: alla prosa si accompagnano innovative costruzioni grafiche e contributi artistici. Alternativo nelle finalità: la narrazione storica come veicolo di emancipazione culturale collettiva.

Per questo crediamo che Cronache Ribelli sia molto di più di questo libro. Speriamo che questa rappresenti solo la prima tappa di un ciclo di avventure editoriali che ci permettano, nel nostro piccolo, di offrire un modo diverso di divulgare la Storia e un modo diverso per cambiare la società che ci circonda. 

Un progetto come quello che pensiamo di portare avanti non può che partire dal basso. Per questo abbiamo deciso di lanciare un crowdfunding, virtuale e non, che abbia lo scopo di mettere insieme un piccolo capitale da investire in tre ambiti fondamentali.

Prima di tutto lo sviluppo di un progetto informatico che renda ancora più fruibile l’accesso alle informazioni che col tempo cercheremo di dare. L’idea è quella di creare uno spazio virtuale in cui gran parte del materiale resti gratuito e liberamente condivisibile, e all’interno del quale si possa sviluppare costantemente un dibattito su quali temi affrontare e con quali modalità ampliare la documentazione interna. Uno spazio in cui ai consueti approfondimenti testuali si possano affiancare video e audio, sempre nell’intento di rinnovare la nostra narrazione e nell’ottica di coinvolgere più persone possibili. 

In second’ordine, ma non per importanza, vogliamo mettere in piedi un piccolo team che riunisca individualità con varie competenze. Innanzitutto storici, magari giovani, e che si occupino di temi abitualmente poco approfonditi. Affiancati da una serie di figure creative, con competenze informatiche e di montaggio video. Con un gruppo di questo tipo intendiamo progettare una o più proposte editoriali, tanto cartacee quanto sul web, che si articolino attraverso percorsi diversificati e in grado di valorizzare le capacità e le inclinazioni di ognuno.

Infine i proventi del crowdfunding serviranno a finanziare gli spostamenti sul territorio indispensabili a far conoscere il progetto Cronache Ribelli e lavorare per la costruzione di quella rete alternativa di distribuzione che sogniamo di creare. Una rete in cui oltre a far circolare materiale storico sarebbe bello inserire tutta una serie di prodotti editoriali alternativi. Una rete che riunisca associazioni di varia natura, gruppi di quartiere, singoli attivisti e molto altro ancora. Una rete in cui si possano trovare spazi di dialogo, confronti aperti e anche momenti di convivialità condivisa.

L’idea è quella di creare uno spazio virtuale in cui gran parte del materiale resti gratuito e liberamente condivisibile, e all’interno del quale si possa sviluppare costantemente un dibattito su quali temi affrontare e con quali modalità ampliare la documentazione interna. Uno spazio in cui ai consueti approfondimenti testuali si possano affiancare video e audio, sempre nell’intento di rinnovare la nostra narrazione e nell’ottica di coinvolgere più persone possibili. 
In second’ordine, ma non per importanza, vogliamo mettere in piedi un piccolo team che riunisca individualità con varie competenze. Innanzitutto storici, magari giovani, e che si occupino di temi abitualmente poco approfonditi. Affiancati da una serie di figure creative, con competenze informatiche e di montaggio video. Con un gruppo di questo tipo intendiamo progettare una o più proposte editoriali, tanto cartacee quanto sul web, che si articolino attraverso percorsi diversificati e in grado di valorizzare le capacità e le inclinazioni di ognuno.
Infine i proventi del crowdfunding serviranno a finanziare gli spostamenti sul territorio indispensabili a far conoscere il progetto Cronache Ribelli e lavorare per la costruzione di quella rete alternativa di distribuzione che sogniamo di creare. Una rete in cui oltre a far circolare materiale storico sarebbe bello inserire tutta una serie di prodotti editoriali alternativi. Una rete che riunisca associazioni di varia natura, gruppi di quartiere, singoli attivisti e molto altro ancora. Una rete in cui si possano trovare spazi di dialogo, confronti aperti e anche momenti di convivialità condivisa.

story:
Short Summary

Ekklesia is an independent, not-for-profit thinktank which orients its work around the changing role of beliefs, values and faith/non-faith in public life.  We have a track record in producing reports and commentary that is both thought-provoking and transformative.

Our Indiegogo campaign is to launch our latest project. "Sexuality, struggle and saintliness: same sex love and the church" is a groundbreaking new book from Ekklesia associate Savitri Hensman.

The author identifies the differences over same-sex love that have led to heated arguments and threats of division in churches. Over the past century, increasing numbers of theologians have come to believe that faithful, self-giving partnerships are not at odds with biblical teaching, a view now shared by many churchgoers. Yet others strongly disagree. This book examines the shift in thinking on sex-uality, delves beneath the surface of some of the conflicts that have arisen, offers reflections on the Bible and tradition and their relevance today and explores how churches can, and do, live with disagreement. It draws on articles which have previously been published on the Ekklesia web-site but also contains new material and fresh insights.

Ekklesia is a small think tank operating on limited resources. This Indiegogo campaign will help fund an important piece of work that we believe will have an important contribution to the debates on same-sex relationships and the church.

What We Need & What You Get:

In order to produce this book we need to raise at least £600. This will pay for production, designing and editing the work, and contribute to our publicity and marketing campaign.

We will be offering the following perks:

·  £3 an advance copy of the Ebook

·  £10 a paperback copy with your name in the credits

·  £25 a signed paperback copy with your name in the credits

·  £50 an invitation to pre-launch drinks along with a signed paperback copy and your name in the credits.

If we don’t reach our goal the money will still be used to part fund the project, and we will seek alternative ways to ensure the book is fully funded. This may delay the launch of the book but we anticipate it being produced by the end of 2015 at the latest.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand people have limited income with many demands for help with funding campaigns. If you are unable to contribute but still would like to help, please could you:

  • Spread the word on social media and make some noise about the project.
  • Don’t forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!
